subject: (dove)
body:
im thankful that even though i spent two days filled with anxiety, things worked out really well for me

im thankful that even though i gave up on finding love a long time ago, i feel like i've finally found it

im thankful for music that makes me happy and salty chocolate bars

im thankful for dinner with my family and feeling at peace

im thankful for consistent communication that feels healthy and fulfilling

im thankful that i finally moved on from something i thought i would never get over

im thankful for no longer being afraid of my future

\- dove (8/18/17).
[what are you thankful for?](https://docs.google.com/forms/u/1/d/1X6z1T5sSBXxFpfGI7gPZzQIp_qgkDCsVVCLV4yrw1a4/edit?usp=forms_home&ths=true)
